Package com.guardtime.container.verification.rule.generic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationDataExistenceRule
    This rule verifies that the annotation data is actually present in the Container It expects to find successful results for rules verifying existence and integrity of AnnotationsManifest and SingleAnnotationManifest
    AnnotationDataIntegrityRule
    This rule verifies that the annotation data has not been corrupted.
    AnnotationsManifestExistenceRule
    This rule verifies that the annotations manifest is actually present in the Container
    AnnotationsManifestIntegrityRule
    This rule verifies that the annotmanifest has not been corrupted.
    DocumentExistenceRule
    This rule verifies that the tested ContainerDocument is indeed present in the Container It expects to find successful results for rules verifying existence and integrity of DocumentsManifest.
    DocumentIntegrityRule
    This rule verifies that the ContainerDocument being tested has not been corrupted.
    DocumentsManifestExistenceRule
    This rule verifies that the documents manifest is actually present in the Container
    DocumentsManifestIntegrityRule
    This rule verifies the validity of the datamanifest which contains records for all ContainerDocuments associated with a signature.
    MimeTypeIntegrityRule
    Rule that verifies the existence and content of a MIMETYPE file in the container.
    MultiHashElementIntegrityRule  
    SignatureExistenceRule
    Rule that verifies that there is a signature in the container for the given SignatureContent Will terminate verification upon non OK results.
    SignatureIntegrityRule
    Rule that verifies the ContainerSignature of a SignatureContent by using a SignatureVerifier to verify the underlying signature.
    SignatureSignsManifestRule
    Rule to verify the input hash of root signature and Manifest.
    SingleAnnotationManifestExistenceRule
    This rule verifies the existence of the meta-data file of an annotation.
    SingleAnnotationManifestIntegrityRule
    This rule verifies the validity of the manifest file containing meta-data for an annotation.
    TrustedHashAlgorithmExistenceRule
    Rule that checks whether there are any DataHashes with HashAlgorithm that have state of HashAlgorithm.status NORMAL
    TrustedHashListIntegrityRule
    Rule that checks whether DataHashes in FileReference match those in MultiHashElement.
    UnimplementedHashAlgorithmExistenceRule
    Rule that checks if there are any DataHashes that use a HashAlgorithm which has state HashAlgorithm.status NOT_IMPLEMENTED
